p: The WI38 human embryonic fibroblast, lung tissue-derived cell line was obtained from the Korean Cell Line Bank (Seoul, Korea). The WI38 fibroblast cells were maintained in α-MEM media supplemented with 20% heat-inactivated FBS and 1% P/S at 37°C in a 5% CO 2 incubator. The LPS was dissolved in 1X PBS.
